listing.Title: 10-kt. Seven Diamond Ladies Heart Ring (0.08 TW)
listing.Content: This ladies fashion ring dazzles with hearts and diamonds. The gold band is crafted into delicate, open hearts. Seven brilliant-cut diamonds add a bit of sparkle.

listing.Title: 10-Kt. Diamond Ring (.25 TW)
listing.Content: Nineteen round diamonds accent this 10-karat yellow gold ring with filigree accents.

listing.Title: 10-kt. Pearl and Diamond Butterfly Earrings
listing.Content: Perfectly proportioned 5.5- to 6-mm cultured pearls on 10-karat yellow gold settings highlight these petite earrings. A dainty rhodium-plated gold butterfly studded with a diamond (0.02 total carat weight, J-K color, I-2 clarity) rests atop each pearl.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond 'S' Tennis Bracelet (2.00 TW)
listing.Content: Crafted in white and yellow gold, this ring displays a band of seven round diamonds. Order your new gold and diamond fashion ring today at our low, online price.

listing.Title: 14-kt. White Gold, Pearl and Diamond Ring
listing.Content: Show your romantic side with this 14-karat diamond and pearl ring. Set in a domed band of 14-karat white gold, the ring features a 7-mm cultured pearl. Curved rows of diamonds flank the pearl.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Gold Diamond Present Future Pendant (.25TW)
listing.Content: Designed with three large, sparkling diamonds to represent past, present, and future, this stunning pendant is set in gleaming 14-karat gold. It incorporates a total of nine diamonds (0.25 total carat weight, K color, I-2 to I-3 clarity).

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Pendant (.33 TW)
listing.Content: In this simple, yet elegant pendant, a round brilliant diamond (0.33 total carat weight, H-J color, I-1 to I-2 clarity) is prong-set in 14-karat white gold.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Earrings (0.33 TW)
listing.Content: Dazzle your way into her heart, with these classic diamond solitaire earrings. Two brilliant-cut diamonds (0.33 total carat weight, G-H color, I-1 to I-2 clarity) are set in four prongs of 14-karat white gold.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Cross Pendant (.06 TW)
listing.Content: Over a cleanly sculpted Roman cross of 14-karat white gold drapes a slender banner containing three bright prong-set round diamonds (0.06 total carat weight, H-I color, I clarity).

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Stud Earrings (.50 TW)
listing.Content: Every jewelry collection needs a classic pair of diamond solitaire earrings. Set in 14-karat gold, these diamond stud earrings (0.50 total carat weight) have post backs with butterfly clasps.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Cultured Pearl Diamond Earrings
listing.Content: Create an elegant appearance with these pearl and diamond stud earrings. Set in 14-karat yellow gold, each earring features an 8 to 8.5-mm cultured white pearl. Prong-set round diamonds accent the pearls. Posts with butterfly clasps secure the earrings.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond 7.5-8 mm Pearl Pendant
listing.Content: Add a classic to your jewelry collection with this 14-karat gold, diamond, and pearl necklace. The 7.5-8 mm cultured white pearl creates the focal point of the pendant, while a diamond (0.10 TW) adds sparkle.

listing.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Earrings (.50 TW)
listing.Content: This earring set has two brilliant-cut diamonds (0.50 total carat weight, G-H color, I-1 to I-2 clarity) set in four prongs of 14-karat white gold.
